column2:
Commentary: Staff assesses that risks from pension financing needs are low. The pension system covers Qatari nationals,
around 10% of Qatar's total population. Key revisions made in 2023 enhanced the system's sustainability. The authorities
plan to conduct and publish own sustainability study.
